1.question: Which of the following are elements of an Auto Scaling group? (Choose all that apply)

2.question: What are the three types of load balancers that Elastic Load Balancing offers? (Choose all that apply)

3.question: In Elastic Load Balancing, when the load balancing detects an unhealthy target, which of the following are true (Choose all that apply)

options.A: Stops routing traffic to that target
options.B: Resumes routing traffic when it detects that the target is healthy again
options.C: Routes traffic to a healthy target
options.E: e. Resumes routing traffic when manually restarted

options.B: Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volumes
